mapper.select: SELECT t1.villageCode, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.cameraId) AS deviceIds FROM cw_base_village t1 LEFT JOIN cw_base_camera t2 ON t1.villageCode = t2.villageCode WHERE t1.state=0 AND t2.state=0 GROUP BY t1.villageCode

SELECT t1.villageName, t1.villageCode, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.cameraId) AS deviceIds FROM cw_base_village t1 LEFT JOIN cw_base_camera t2 ON t1.villageCode = t2.villageCode WHERE t1.state=0 AND t2.state=0 AND t2.cameraType=2 GROUP BY t1.villageCode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cw_base_camera ( villageCode, cameraId, cameraName, cameraIp, cameraPort, password, loginName, streamSource, buildingNo, installAdd, prducetBrand, productModel, productCode, companyCode, thridType, cameraType, inOutFlag, cameraState, gisType, lon, lat, alt, vehicleChannelNo, camreaChannelID, thirdCameraId, standardCameraId, createTime, updateTime ) VALUE ( #{villageCode}, #{cameraId}, #{cameraName}, #{cameraIp}, #{cameraPort}, #{password}, #{loginName}, #{streamSource}, #{buildingNo}, #{installAdd}, #{prducetBrand}, #{productModel}, #{productCode}, #{companyCode}, #{thridType}, #{cameraType}, #{inOutFlag}, #{cameraState}, #{gisType}, #{lon}, #{lat}, #{alt}, #{vehicleChannelNo}, #{camreaChannelID}, #{thirdCameraId}, #{standardCameraId}, NOW(), NOW() )

INSERT INTO cw_base_camera ( villageCode, cameraId, cameraName, cameraIp, cameraPort, password, loginName, streamSource, buildingNo, installAdd, prducetBrand, productModel, productCode, companyCode, thridType, cameraType, inOutFlag, cameraState, gisType, lon, lat, alt, vehicleChannelNo, camreaChannelID, thirdCameraId, standardCameraId, createTime, updateTime ) VALUE ( #{villageCode}, #{cameraId}, #{cameraName}, #{cameraIp}, #{cameraPort}, #{password}, #{loginName}, #{streamSource}, #{buildingNo}, #{installAdd}, #{prducetBrand}, #{productModel}, #{productCode}, #{companyCode}, #{thridType}, #{cameraType}, #{inOutFlag}, #{cameraState}, #{gisType}, #{lon}, #{lat}, #{alt}, #{vehicleChannelNo}, #{camreaChannelID}, #{thirdCameraId}, #{standardCameraId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE cw_base_camera SET state = 1 WHERE id = #{id}

update.foreach:
update cw_base_camera
villageCode = #{item.villageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cameraId =#{item.cameraId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cameraName = #{item.cameraName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cameraIp = #{item.cameraIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cameraPort = #{item.cameraPort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
loginName = #{item.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
streamSource = #{item.streamSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buildingNo = #{item.buildingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
installAdd = #{item.installAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prducetBrand = #{item.prducetBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productModel = #{item.productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productCode = #{item.productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyCode = #{item.companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cameraType = #{item.installAdd,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
thridType = #{item.thridType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
inOutFlag = #{item.inOutFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
cameraState = #{item.cameraState,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
gisType = #{item.gisType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
lon = #{item.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lat = #{item.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
alt = #{item.alt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
vehicleChannelNo = #{item.vehicleChannelNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
camreaChannelId = #{item.camreaChannelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thirdCameraId = #{item.thirdCameraId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standardCameraId = #{item.standardCameraId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateTime = now()
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM cw_base_camera
state != 1
AND cameraIp = #{cameraIp}
LIMIT 0,1
